name: White Noise
author: 作者名字
description: White noise is a continuous, uniform noise widely used to help people relax, focus, and sleep. It masks environmental noises, improves comfort, alleviates anxiety and stress, while also enhancing concentration and sleep quality. Simply play white noise to enjoy a tranquil life.

name: Pink Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Pink noise is a type of noise that aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It regulates brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a better quality of life.

name: Red Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Red noise aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It balances brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a more tranquil life.

name: Blue Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Blue noise aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It balances brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a more tranquil life.

name: Gray Noise
author: 作者名字
description: Grey noise aids in relaxation, enhances focus, and improves sleep quality. It balances brain activity, alleviates stress and anxiety, allowing you to enjoy a more tranquil life.

name: 174 Hz-Pain Relief
author: 作者名字
description: The steady low 174 Hz solfeggio frequency relieves anxiety and stress, bringing body and mind back to a state of stillness and stability. Perfect for unwinding under pressure and finding sleepless nights.

name: 285 Hz-Healing
author: 作者名字
description: The 285 Hz solfeggio frequency boosts the self-healing capabilities, stimulating self-recovery energies in tissues and cells, awakening the body’s self-healing mechanisms. Perfect for exhaustion from work pressure or lack of sleep, as well as moments when the body feels tired and weak.

name: 396 Hz-Cleanse
author: 作者名字
description: The 396 Hz solfeggio frequency dissolves fear and anxiety, helping regain inner strength and confidence, restoring a balanced, positive state of mind. Great for times of self doubt or overwhelmed by pressure.

name: 417 Hz-Release Neg
author: 作者名字
description: The 417 Hz solfeggio frequency clears away negative emotional energy, delivering refreshing and restoring energies to body and mind, dissolving suppressed and stagnant moods, gradually calming one down to embrace the goodness of life again.

name: 528 Hz-Release
author: 作者名字
description: 528 Hz is known as the “Love Frequency”, repairing damaged DNA, strengthening innate healing abilities, awakening the body's wisdom, and recalibrating life-giving forces during times of diminished vital signs.

name: 639 Hz-Love Healing
author: 作者名字
description: The 639 Hz solfeggio frequency repairs relationships, unblocking channels of communication, regaining a sense of close intimacy. Great when experiencing discord, alienation from lovers or friends, or feelings of isolation and coldness.

name: 741 Hz-EmoDetox
author: 作者名字
description: The 741 Hz solfeggio frequency awakens higher states of consciousness and intuitive wisdom, opening doorways to deeper self-awareness and intuition. Useful when facing major decisions or feeling helpless confusion.

name: 852 Hz-Clarity
author: 作者名字
description: The 852 Hz solfeggio frequency helps the body and mind return to order, rebuilding vital signs, restoring vigor. Useful when feeling totally scattered and diminished vitality.

name: 963 Hz-Awakening
author: 作者名字
description: The 963Hz solfeggio frequency activates the light body, accessing higher states of awareness, connecting to the spiritual intellect dimensions within oneself. Great when feeling the need to upgrade the soul and body.
